Class Controller

java.lang.Object
controller.Controller
public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object

    • encryptMD5

      private java.lang.String encryptMD5​(java.lang.String password) throws java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
      Here method than hashes password
      Parameters:
      password - user password
      Returns:
      hash of user password
      Throws:
      java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException - if MD5 absents

    • checkAnswer

      private boolean checkAnswer​(int answer, java.lang.String login, java.lang.String password, java.util.Scanner in, Guest guest) throws java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
      Check answer, login and password on correct values
      Parameters:
      answer - response number
      login - user's login
      password - user's password
      in - reads data from a source
      guest - current user
      Returns:
      if login was performed, it will return true. Otherwise, it will return false
      Throws:
      java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException - if MD5 absents

    • controllerWelcome

      Throws:
      java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException - if MD5 absents

    • controllerBuyer

      private void controllerBuyer​(Site site, Buyer buyer)

      Parameters:
      site - site with which buyer work
      buyer - current customer

    • controllerAdmin
